lastMeetingBetween

public static int lastMeetingBetween(java.lang.Long user_id,
                                     java.lang.Long met_with_id)
How many interactions ago user_id1 met with met_with_id

Parameters:
user_id -
met_with_id -
Returns:
if user_id spoke with met_with_id, then 3 other users, returns 3, e.g.; = -1 if user_id never spoke with them

removeUserFrom

public static boolean removeUserFrom(java.lang.Long room_id,
                                     java.lang.Long user_id)
Remove the given user from the given room

Parameters:
user_id - the user_id of the User to remove from the room
room_id - the id of the room to remove from
Returns:
true on success, false if user_id or room_id does not exist
